classifications.author: ReproFreedomAdvocate
classifications.explanation: This post strongly aligns with left-wing political views for several reasons: 1) The use of rights-based language around bodily autonomy ('undeniable right to control her own body') is a core progressive position, 2) The framing of abortion as a 'fundamental human right' rather than a moral or religious issue is characteristic of left-wing advocacy, 3) The absolute nature of the statement ('must be protected at all costs') matches the strong pro-choice stance typically associated with the political left, 4) Even the author's username 'ReproFreedomAdvocate' uses terminology ('reproductive freedom') that is commonly associated with progressive/left-wing abortion rights activism rather than conservative rhetoric around the issue.

classifications.author: ProChoiceChampion

classifications.author: ProChoiceChampion

The language and position taken are consistently aligned with mainstream left-wing views on abortion rights.
